I’m inspired by software. I like to build products & read books especially technology, spirituality, autobiographies, world history & economy.

I currently live in Kathmandu, Nepal and work in the intersection of digital ownership

Over the years, I have lived in India (Allahabad) and the United States (Ohio & California) and am/have been part of several organizations including Venture 23, iBriz AI, Innovate Tech & Advanced Pedagogy, Oyster Financials, Insight Workshop, Clip, Mozilla Foundation & Code for Nepal.

I also invest in and advise several technology startups in Nepal and abroad.

You can reach me at mailto:namaste@prashish.xyz or LinkedIn.
